definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Theseus led the virgin in Crete went ashore.
sentences.chinese: 忒修斯領着童男童女在克里特上岸了。

sentences.english: The boy remains in hospital for observation and treatment.
sentences.chinese: 該男童仍在醫院接受觀察和治療。

sentences.english: The first case occurred in an 8-year-old boy from Central Jakarta.
sentences.chinese: 第1例發生於中雅加達市一名8歲男童。

sentences.english: The first case occurred in a five-year-old male from East Bekasi, West Java Province.
sentences.chinese: 第一例發生於西爪哇省東勿加泗一名5歲男童。

sentences.english: The case, which was fatal, occurred in a 13-year-old boy from South Jakarta.
sentences.chinese: 該致命病例發生於南雅加達一名13歲男童。

sentences.english: Test results on the child, who is presently hospitalized, are pending.
sentences.chinese: 該男童目前正在住院，尚在等待化驗結果。

sentences.english: Besides the short stature and microcephaly, the patient had developmental delay in language.
sentences.chinese: 男童除了生長遲緩及小頭症，還有語言發展遲緩。

sentences.english: The first case is a 13 year-old male from Alexandria Governorate.
sentences.chinese: 第一個病例是亞歷山大省的一名13歲男童。

sentences.english: He was exposed to sick birds during the first three days of March.
sentences.chinese: 這名男童曾在3月的頭3天接觸過病禽。

sentences.english: The second patient was a 9-year-old boy from Tra Vinh Province, also located in the southern part of the country.
sentences.chinese: 第二個病人也是來自該國南部茶榮省的9歲男童。

sentences.english: This year, it is enshrined virgin of the year.
sentences.chinese: 這一年，又是供奉童男童女的年頭了。

sentences.english: The case occurred in a 15-year-old boy from Tasikmalaya District, West Java Province.
sentences.chinese: 該病例發生於來自西爪哇省打橫縣的一名15歲男童。

sentences.english: The second case occurred in a 9-year-old boy from South Jakarta.
sentences.chinese: 第2例發生於南雅加達一名9歲男童。

sentences.english: They are much more likely than men and boys to be the ones burdened with collecting drinking-water.
sentences.chinese: 在取水時她們更可能比男子和男童有困難。

sentences.english: Both boys had contact with sick/dead poultry prior to the illness onset.
sentences.chinese: 兩名男童都有發病前與病死家禽的密切接觸史。

sentences.english: There are two boys playing marbles, while a boy nearby rolls a hoop.
sentences.chinese: 有兩個男孩玩彈珠，而一名男童附近的軋輥一夏。

definition: to send or deliver to the hospital
to fall off or jump off a building
lost/missing/to lose (sb in one's charge)/to get lost/to wander away/to lose (flavor, freshness, shape, hair, one's good looks etc)/to lose meaning (in translation)
